newsitem.title: USA: Fleming Companies sues Furr's alleging waste.
newsitem.headline: Fleming Companies sues Furr's alleging waste.

text.p: - Fleming companies Inc filed a derivative suit against Furr's Supermarkets Inc, its directors, and investor Windward Capital Associates of New York this week in the Chancery Court of Delaware.

In court information papers, Fleming accused the defendants of alleged "waste and mismanagement...conspiracy and aiding and abetting claims." The complaint document itself will not be available until it has been served.
Fleming is an Oklahoma City, Oklahoma-based food distribution company that operates in 42 states and owns 270 stores.
Furr's is a privately-owned company based in Albuquerque, New Mexico. According to Hoover's, Furr's is 35 percent owned by Fleming and is its largest customer.
A Furr's spokesperson could not be reached for comment.
